front: Which platforms support the integration of SAP Fiori?
back: SAP Enterprise Portal, SAP Cloud Platform Portal, SAP Cloud Platform Mobile Services

front: Which personalization elements can be assigned to user roles
Which service areas are provided by the SAP HANA platform
Which areas were re-imagined in SAP S/4HANA
back: User Experience, Business processes, System Configuration, Database models

front: How can you create a SAP Gateway service based on a CDS View
What has to be created by a developer for an OData Service in RAP
For intent-based navigation, what does an intent consist of?
What can be used as target in a target mapping?
back: Web Dynpro application, Generic URL, ABAP Transaction, SAPUI5 Application

front: What is needed to define a target mapping for a Web Dynpro ABAP application?
back: System alias, Web Dynpro application, Web Dynpro configuration

front: How can you enable adaptation at runtime for SAP Fiori apps?
back: Target mapping to runtime authoring plugin, User role SAP_UI_FLEX_KEY_USER, SAP Fiori Catalog /UIF/SAP_RTA_PLUGIN

front: Which terms are correct when talking about extensibility for SAP applications in a front-end server?
back: SAPUI5 Adaptation/Extension, SAP Fiori Elements Adaptation
